name: user_change
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A member's data has changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							 The user_change event is sent to all connections for a workspace when a member updates their profile or data. Clients can use this to update their local cache of members. Use the users.profile.set method to update user profile data.
